mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_MOB_INS_TARGET(VC_TARGET_NAME, VC_TARGET_NOTE, DT_TARGET_ADD_TIME, VC_TARGET_INS_VALID) VALUES (#{targetName},#{targetNote}, getdate(), #{targetInsValid})
mapper.update: UPDATE T_MOB_INS_TARGET SET DT_TARGET_DEL_TIME = getdate() WHERE N_TARGET_ID = #{targetID} AND DT_TARGET_DEL_TIME IS NULL
mapper.select: SELECT N_TARGET_ID ,VC_TARGET_NAME ,VC_TARGET_NOTE ,CONVERT(varchar(20), DT_TARGET_ADD_TIME, 20) as DT_TARGET_ADD_TIME ,CONVERT(varchar(20), DT_TARGET_DEL_TIME, 20) as DT_TARGET_DEL_TIME ,VC_TARGET_INS_VALID FROM T_MOB_INS_TARGET WHERE DT_TARGET_DEL_TIME IS NULL
